item.title: EKC 17 HAS BEEN RELEASED. LOTS OF CHANGES. THINGS ARE RUNNING VERY SMOOTHLY AT THE MOMENT. DETAILS ON THE THE UPDATE CAN BE FOUND AT FACEBOOK.COM/ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG. ANOTHER WAY TO GET MOVIES AND SHOWS RIGHT NOW, IS TO CHECK OUT THE APK SYSTEM. CLICK DOWN FROM APK INSTALLER AND INSTALL TERRARIUM. FOLLOW THE PROMPTS AFTER YOU CLICK. AFTER EACH APK IS INSTALLED IT CAN BE LAUNCHED FROM WITHIN EKC FOR SIMPLICITY. CLICK ON YOU DESIRED APK IN THE APK SUB MENU BY CLICKING DOWN WHEN APK IS HIGHLIGHTED. ALL APKS ARE IN RED-
DONATIONS ARE ALWAYS VERY APPRECIATED-IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO DONATE YOU CAN AT PAYPAL.ME/ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG - YOU CAN PURCHASE PRELOADED DEVICES AT ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG.COM
GREAT MUSIC TV IN THE FLUXUS ADDON IN THE LIVE TV SUB MENU. CHECK IT OUT. CLICK ON FLUXUS THAN CLICK UP. ALL MUSIC CHOICE STATIONS STREAM GREAT

PLAYERS KLUB SIGN UP SITE IS ACTIVE AGAIN. COST IS $5 A MONTH AND YOU GET GREAT LIVE TV. SIGN UP AT BIT.LY/PLAYERSIPTV-AFTER YOU MAKE AN ACCOUNT SIMPLY ENTER IN YOUR LOG IN INFO UNDER LIVE TV IN THE PK LOG IN SECTION
